attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This man is an utter disgrace to cumbria , he does nothing constructive , he wont answer questions ,he wont answer emails, he has the unions doing his dirty work to disuade people.he wont stick up for his own country !
He stands back while people of this county suffer , we dont need politicians like this !
He needs to be removed forthwith to improve relations !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
